The marker tag will still prevent interaction though

Fixes ArmorStands losing functionality due to 'optimizations'

carpet-fixes.rule.armorStandNegateLavaDa: Fixes armor stands not taking damage in lava
carpet-fixes.rule.armorStandsCantRideVeh: Fixes armor stands not being able to ride vehicles
carpet-fixes.rule.arrowEffectsBypassTote: Fixes arrows of harming bypassing Totems of Undying
carpet-fixes.rule.badVillagerPyrotechnic: Fixes villagers being hurt by there own fireworks
carpet-fixes.rule.beaconsAlwaysPlaySound: Fixes beacons always playing the depowering sound when broken even if it was not powered
carpet-fixes.rule.bedLandingWrongCollisi: Fixes being able to land on a trapdoor on top of a bed and get less fall damage even though you haven't touched the bed
Fixes a 8x teleport exploit using beds
carpet-fixes.rule.beeDupeFix.desc: Fixes bees duplicating while trying to load a beehive/beenest in unloaded chunks
carpet-fixes.rule.beeNotLeavingHiveFix.d: Fixes bees not leaving the hive in the end & nether due to weather conditions
carpet-fixes.rule.beeStuckInVoidFix.desc: Fixes bees getting stuck in the void due to gravity being disabled
carpet-fixes.rule.beesDropLikeBouldersFi: Fixes bees just not flying when spawning due to navigation not being set
carpet-fixes.rule.beesFearRainFix.desc: Fixes bees being able to feel none-existing rain
carpet-fixes.rule.beesSwimInWaterAndDieF:
Bees must be reloaded for the fix to take place
[MC-190261](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-190261)
Fixes bees trying to swim in water causing them to die
carpet-fixes.rule.blackstoneButtonBreakS: Fixes Blackstone Buttons taking longer then other buttons to break

This bug allows you to teleport to the end at your overworld position, amongst many other problems

Fixes incorrect block collision checks for players
carpet-fixes.rule.blockUpdateOrderFix.ex:
Warning! This changes how block updates are done and could effect some contraptions
[MC-161402](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-161402)
carpet-fixes.rule.blockUpdateOrderFix.de: Fixes issues where block updates are directional. Changes block update order from XYZ to XZY
carpet-fixes.rule.blueWitherSkullNotSave: Fixes Wither skull projectiles not saving if its charged/blue in there nbt
carpet-fixes.rule.boatsCreatedTooHighFix: Fixes boats created from dispensers spawning more then half a block higher then the water
carpet-fixes.rule.boatsDontTakeFallDamag: Fixes boats not being destroyed by fall damage
carpet-fixes.rule.boatsStuckInDispensers: Fixes boats getting created within the dispenser that created them
carpet-fixes.rule.boatsTakeFallDamageFix: Fixes boats breaking and giving fall damage under certain circumstances
carpet-fixes.rule.breakAnythingDoorGoalF: Fixes Zombies & Vindicators being able to break any block where a door was
carpet-fixes.rule.breakSwapGeneralItemDu: Fixes a general item dupe using shulker boxes
carpet-fixes.rule.brewingResetsOnUnloadF: Fixes brewing stands resetting there brewTime when being unloaded
carpet-fixes.rule.brokenHiddenStatusEffe: Fixes broken status effect logic resulting in hidden status effects not running onRemove() or onApplied() for the correct effect strength
carpet-fixes.rule.bucketableMobsNotDetac: Fixes leashes not being detached on mobs being put in a bucket. So you don't get your leash back
carpet-fixes.rule.buriedTreasureAlwaysCe: Fixes buried treasure always generating in the center of a chunk
carpet-fixes.rule.chestUsablePastWorldBo:
We do this by preventing chests from merging with other chests outside of the world border
[MC-67844](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-67844)
Fixes chests being accessible outside the world border by placing a chest near it
carpet-fixes.rule.chorusFruitFallDamageF: Fixes chorus fruits item not resetting fall damage on teleport
carpet-fixes.rule.chunkSaveCooldownDelay: Allows you to change the chunk save cooldown added in 22w05a

Set to 10s by default, this is the delay between chunks aggressively saving
If your server has large lag spikes due to chunk saving, you can raise this number.
For obvious reasons, this rule is disabled when `reIntroduceVeryAggressiveSaving` is enabled
carpet-fixes.rule.comparatorSkipsBlocked: Fixes comparators being unable to get the signal strength from a blocked chest
carpet-fixes.rule.comparatorTransparency: Fixes comparators not being able to get containers through opaque full blocks like pistons & observers
carpet-fixes.rule.comparatorUpdateFix.de: Fixes the issue where comparators don't always get updated correctly
carpet-fixes.rule.conversionFix.desc: Fixes multiple different mob conversions, not transferring all the correct nbt
carpet-fixes.rule.convertConvertingZombi: Fixes being able to start the conversion of zombie villagers while they are already converting
carpet-fixes.rule.creativeEnchantingCost: Fixes enchanting in creative mode still deducting experience
carpet-fixes.rule.creeperPortalFuseReset: Fixes creepers resetting there fuse duration when travelling through a nether portal after being ignited by flint & steel
carpet-fixes.rule.crossDimensionTeleport: Fixes client stats being lost when teleporting between dimensions
carpet-fixes.rule.crystalExplodeOnExplod: Fixes End Crystals not exploding when damaged from explosions. End Crystal chaining
carpet-fixes.rule.daylightSensorPlacemen: Fixes daylight sensors not setting there power state when placed by a player
carpet-fixes.rule.debugSimulatedOutOfMem: A jigsaw block with a lightning rod ontop of itself will make it throw a real out of memory exception when receiving a block update
carpet-fixes.rule.debugStackDepth.desc: Placing turtle eggs on a barrier block will make it output the current stack depth on shape updates
carpet-fixes.rule.debugStackDepth.extra: Checking a stack depth can be expensive, do not abuse!
carpet-fixes.rule.debugStackTrace.desc: Placing turtle eggs on a jigsaw block will make it output the current stack trace on shape updates
carpet-fixes.rule.debugStackTrace.extra: The rule `reIntroduceInstantBlockUpdates` should be used for better traces!
Allows you to change the delay between autosaves in ticks
Shortening this number will make your server save more often which will also spread the load on the server
carpet-fixes.rule.depthStriderSlowsRipti: Fixes depth strider slowing down riptide, causing riptide to be slower in water and messing up the launching
carpet-fixes.rule.detectorRailDetectsToo: Fixes detector rails detecting the minecarts to early and causing minecarts to go in the wrong direction
carpet-fixes.rule.detectorRailOffsetUpda: Fixes comparator signal ending prematurely due to offset block updates
carpet-fixes.rule.detectorRailsDontPower: Fixes detector rails not powering powered rails diagonally
carpet-fixes.rule.directionalBlockSlowdo: Fixes movement slowdown being calculated based on last block in search. Uses the slowest value instead
carpet-fixes.rule.directionalMinecartCol: Fixes minecart colliding when standing still
carpet-fixes.rule.doorBreakNotStoppedOnD: Fixes BreakDoorGoal not stopping on entity death, leading to cracks that stay for a while
carpet-fixes.rule.doubleBlocksSkipEntity: Fixes double blocks like beds & doors from skipping the entity check
carpet-fixes.rule.dripstoneSkipsEntityCh: Fixes pointed dripstone skipping the entity check
carpet-fixes.rule.drownedEnchantedTriden: Fixes enchantments not working on tridents if thrown by a drowned
carpet-fixes.rule.duplicateBlockUpdatesF: Fixes some redstone components sending duplicated block updates
carpet-fixes.rule.duplicateEntityUUIDFix: Fixes entities created with duplicate uuid's
carpet-fixes.rule.eatCakeFromAllSidesFix: Fixes cakes being eaten from all sides
carpet-fixes.rule.endCrystalPlacingTooEa: Fixes placing end crystals too early not re-summoning the Ender Dragon
carpet-fixes.rule.endCrystalsOnPushDontS: Fixes end crystals not attempting to respawn the dragon when being pushed by a piston
carpet-fixes.rule.endPortalRemovesEffect: Fixes the end portal removing your status effects when going from the overworld to the end
carpet-fixes.rule.endVoidRingsFix.desc: Fixes the void rings in the end, which is a floating point error
carpet-fixes.rule.enderDragonDoesntDropB: Fixes the enderdragon not dropping the blocks it breaks
carpet-fixes.rule.endermanAvoidProjectil: Fixes enderman doing teleporting effects and sounds and avoiding projectiles while in a vehicle
carpet-fixes.rule.endermanDontTakeExplos: Fixes the endermen not being able to take damage from wither and tnt explosions
carpet-fixes.rule.endermanDontUpdateOnPl:
Only applies if you use datapacks or mods. E.x. Enderman placing a wither skull will not spawn a wither

Fixes enderman not updating the block they place correctly
carpet-fixes.rule.endermanLowerPiercingF: Fixes piercing projectiles lowering there piercing when 'hitting' an enderman
carpet-fixes.rule.endermanPainfulTelepor: Fixes enderman teleporting away during damage, making other damage systems believe the enderman got hurt. Such as wither skulls applying wither

carpet-fixes.rule.endermanUselessMinecar: Fixes enderman constantly trying to teleport when in a minecart under daylight
carpet-fixes.rule.enderpearlClipFix.desc: Fixes enderpearls allowing you to clip through blocks
carpet-fixes.rule.entityBlockCollisionUs: Fixes multiple bugs related to effects happening only when the entity center is in the block instead of hitbox
carpet-fixes.rule.entityGrowingUpCollisi: Fixes Entities growing up still clipping through walls if they have a collision above them
carpet-fixes.rule.explosionBreaksItemFra: Fixes Explosions being able to destroy item frames in water
carpet-fixes.rule.explosionsBypassWorldB: Fixes explosions being able to destroy blocks outside of the world border
carpet-fixes.rule.extendedBlockUpdateOrd:
Changes extended block update order from YZX to XZY
Warning! This changes how some block updates are done and could effect some contraptions
Changes block updates that go 2 blocks out, so they have the same block update order
carpet-fixes.rule.fallingBlockDamageIsOf: Fixes falling block damage bounding box being offset
carpet-fixes.rule.fallingBlockDuplicatio: Fixes falling blocks duping using the end portal
carpet-fixes.rule.fallingBlocksCantReuse: Fixes falling blocks only being able to use end gateways once
carpet-fixes.rule.fallingBlocksCantUseNe: Fixes Falling Blocks not being able to go through nether portals
carpet-fixes.rule.fishingOutsideWaterFix: Fixes being able to fish outside of water
carpet-fixes.rule.followParentGoalBreaks: Fixes the follow parent goal not setting the movement control, causing babies to move incorrectly
carpet-fixes.rule.foxesDisregardPowderSn: Fixes Foxes not Respecting Powder Snow as a Snow Like block, Therefore Powder Snow would not have the same effect as Snow does
carpet-fixes.rule.spectatorAdvancementGr: Fixes advancement criteria being granted to players in Spectator mode
carpet-fixes.rule.foxesDropItemsWithLoot: Fixes gamerule doMobLoot not effecting foxes from dropping their items
carpet-fixes.rule.frictionlessEntitiesFi: Fixes frictionless goats & frogs, currently requires to be modified per mob
carpet-fixes.rule.geodeLavalogFix.desc: Fixes an edge case within geodes where it will waterlog a block next to lava, due to missing fluid check
carpet-fixes.rule.giantTreesHaveExtraLog: Fixes giant trees creating an extra single log at the top corner
carpet-fixes.rule.giveCommandDupeFix.des: Fixes being able to dupe items using the /give command
carpet-fixes.rule.grassSnowLayersFix.des: Fixes grass turning to dirt if more then 1 snow layer is on top of it.
carpet-fixes.rule.hangingEntityTriggersT: Fixes item frames & paintings being able to interact with pressure plates & tripwire hooks, causing them to not de-power
carpet-fixes.rule.hardcodedSeaLevelFix.d: Fixes incorrect sea level height being used when datapacks change the sea height
carpet-fixes.rule.headlessPistonFix.desc: Fixes being able to make and use Headless Pistons
carpet-fixes.rule.hopperMinecartSlowerAt: Fixes hopper minecarts being 4x slower at [0,0,0]
carpet-fixes.rule.hopperUpdateFix.extra:
invisibleHopperFix is automatically enabled when used
[Youtube Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QVOONJ1OY44)
carpet-fixes.rule.hopperUpdateFix.desc: Fixes hoppers not giving block updates when placed while powered
carpet-fixes.rule.hoppersSelectMinecarts: Fixes hoppers choosing a random minecart, resulting in slower item transfers
carpet-fixes.rule.hungerGoesDownInPeacef: Fixes hunger depleting in peaceful mode
carpet-fixes.rule.iceWaterSkipsWaterlogg: Fixes ice not turning to water when broken by a player if the block below is waterlogged
carpet-fixes.rule.illegalBreakingFix.ext:
Illegal blocks are any blocks that have a hardness value of -1.0F

carpet-fixes.rule.illegalBreakingFix.des: Fixes Breaking blocks that should not be able to be broken using headless pistons
carpet-fixes.rule.inconsistentRedstoneTo: Fixes burnt-out redstone torches having inconsistent behavior for turning on again
carpet-fixes.rule.incorrectBounceLogicFi: Fixes some entities not bouncing on slime blocks and getting stuck
carpet-fixes.rule.incorrectBubbleColumnL: Fixes some entities getting stuck in bubble columns
carpet-fixes.rule.incorrectNbtChecks.des: Fixes commands not allowing all nbt tags to work correctly
carpet-fixes.rule.incorrectPistonWorldBo: Fixes pistons being able to push blocks outside of the world border
carpet-fixes.rule.inhabitedTimeFix.desc: Fixes InhabitedTime not always updating in some chunks
carpet-fixes.rule.instantFluidFlowingFix: Fixes fluids being able to instantly flow!
carpet-fixes.rule.invisibleHopperFix.des: Fixes hoppers being invisible when placed next to a powered block
carpet-fixes.rule.invisibleHopperFix.ext: It fixes clients not being able to see the hopper, by redrawing them if powered
carpet-fixes.rule.invulnerableEndCrystal: Fixes being able to make permanent invulnerable end crystals
carpet-fixes.rule.itemFramePlaysSoundOnR: Fixes item frames playing a sound when they are read from nbt
carpet-fixes.rule.jukeboxDiscItemOffsetO: Fixes jukebox not spawning disc in the center of the block when broken
carpet-fixes.rule.lavaCalculatesWrongFir: Fixes lava creating fire with incorrect block states
carpet-fixes.rule.lavaIgnoresBubbleColum: Fixes lava not being able to convert bubble columns to stone
carpet-fixes.rule.leashKnotNotUpdatingOn: Fixes leash not updating when mobs break there leashes
carpet-fixes.rule.lecternBlockDupeFix.de: Fixes a lectern block dupe, it just dupes the lectern block
carpet-fixes.rule.lightningKillsDropsFix: Fixes Lightning killing the items that drop from entities it kills
carpet-fixes.rule.markerArmorStandsCreat: Fixes marker armor stands creating bubbles in water
carpet-fixes.rule.markerArmorStandsTrigg: Fixes marker armor stands being able to trigger traps such as pressure plates, and string
carpet-fixes.rule.maxChunksSavedPerAutoS: Allows you to change the max amount of chunks that can save per autosave
If your server has large lag spikes due to chunk saving, you can lower this number.
Allows you to change the max amount of chunks that can save per tick for the 1.18 chunk saving system
This is for the system which just attempt to save chunks every tick. Max chunks saved per tick
carpet-fixes.rule.maxTickLatency.desc: Allows you to change max tick delay before a task is cancelled
carpet-fixes.rule.maxTickLatency.extra: Lower value raises the task leniency. Basically lower number means higher chance of success
Fixes minecart not bouncing from any transparent block with a full face
carpet-fixes.rule.missingObserverUpdates: Fixes some events / actions not triggering observers
carpet-fixes.rule.mobsAttackThroughBlock:
This might have an impact on performance, although shouldn't be that bad
[MC-2310](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-2310)
Fixes mobs being able to hit entities through blocks
carpet-fixes.rule.mobsConvertingWithoutB: Fixes mobs continuing to convert even if the block is no longer there
carpet-fixes.rule.mobsIgnoreOwnerOnPicku: Fixes Mobs ignoring 'Owner' when picking up loot
carpet-fixes.rule.mobsSpawnOnMovingPisto: Fixes mobs being able to spawn on moving pistons
carpet-fixes.rule.mobsTargetDeadEntities: Fixes mobs that fight as a group targeting dead entities, leading to many bugs
carpet-fixes.rule.movableCoralFanFix.des: Fixes coral being movable. Controversial fix - If you don't like it, don't use it xD
carpet-fixes.rule.movingBlocksDestroyPat: Fixes Moving Blocks from destroying path blocks
carpet-fixes.rule.nocomExploitFix.desc: Prevents the NoCom Exploit from being able to crash the server
carpet-fixes.rule.nocomExploitFix.extra: There is a fabric mod that is able to do this in vanilla!
carpet-fixes.rule.nonSolidBlocksBreakCac: Fixes cactus breaking when moving a non-solid block next to them with a piston
carpet-fixes.rule.noteBlockNotPoweredOnP: Fixes note blocks not setting there powered state when placed by a player
carpet-fixes.rule.observerUpdateFix.desc: Fixes observers not giving shape updates when retracted and immediately repowered
carpet-fixes.rule.obsidianPlatformDestro: Fixes the end obsidian platform breaking blocks above the platform every time you travel to the end
carpet-fixes.rule.ocelotsAndCatsTryToFle: Fixes ocelots and cats trying to flee from the player while being stuck in a vehicle like a boat
carpet-fixes.rule.optimizedBiomeAccess.d: Optimized the getBiome call to be 25% - 75% faster
carpet-fixes.rule.optimizedBiomeAccess.e: This is a fully vanilla optimization. This can optimize the client also, go check Blanket-client-tweaks for that
carpet-fixes.rule.optimizedNeighborUpdat: A memory efficient implementation of the new NeighborUpdater
This kind of prevents update suppression using a normal suppressor. It requires an angled suppressor to work!
This probably changes some rail behavior although so far does not seem to do so. Does change amount of block updates tho
Makes rails faster by removing most updates on themselves, duplicate updates, and doing rail search internally
carpet-fixes.rule.optimizedRecipeManager:
This is a fully vanilla optimization. Improves: [Blast]Furnace/Campfire/Smoker/Stonecutter/Crafting/Sheep Color Choosing
This was mostly made for the auto crafting table, since the performance boost is much more visible while using that mod
Optimized the RecipeManager getFirstMatch call to be up to 3x faster
carpet-fixes.rule.optimizedTicketManager: Initial made for Lithium, although was not exactly vanilla behavior. This is a very small optimization!
carpet-fixes.rule.oresDontDropXpWhenBlow: Fixes ore blocks not dropping experience when blown up - sculk use the same block as ores
carpet-fixes.rule.paletteCopyDataCorrupt:
Warning! Some mods might actually use this bug as part of there design. Use this to test if your mod is affected!
[MC-251664](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-251664)
Fixes Palette copy() using the same `listener` which can cause data corruption
carpet-fixes.rule.parityMovableLightBloc: Allows pistons to push and pull light blocks
carpet-fixes.rule.parityTerribleComparat: Comparators no longer output level 15 if the full block its reading from is powered if there is a container behind it
Relates to [MC-64394](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-64394) which marked as Works As Intended
carpet-fixes.rule.petsBreakLeadsDuringRe: Fixes Leashed pets teleporting to the player when reloaded, breaking there leads
carpet-fixes.rule.pistonDupingFix.extra:
Attachment block update based dupers will do nothing and redstone component update based dupers can no longer keep their duped block
Implementation by Carpet-TIS-Addition - Dupe bad dig good
carpet-fixes.rule.pistonDupingFix.desc: Fixes TNT & carpet dupers, and part of rail dupers
carpet-fixes.rule.pistonReloadInconsiste: Fixes piston lastProgress not being set correctly
carpet-fixes.rule.pistonUpdateOrderIsLoc: Fixes pistons pulling/pushing blocks using a hashmap causing order to be locational
carpet-fixes.rule.pistonsPushEntitiesBeh: Fixes pistons pushing entities behind it, which was the original cause of the item frame dupe
This only fixes modded pistons that use different speeds!
carpet-fixes.rule.pistonsPushTooFarFix.d: Fixes pistons pushing entities too far due to the offset
carpet-fixes.rule.pistonsPushWaterlogged: Fixes being able to push waterlogged blocks while retaining the waterlogged state using a short pulse
carpet-fixes.rule.placeBlocksOutsideWorl: Fixes being able to place blocks outside of the world border
carpet-fixes.rule.playerStepEventFix.des: Fixes players sending the STEP event before the HIT_GROUND event
carpet-fixes.rule.pointedDripstoneWrongC: Fixes being hurt by pointed dripstone when landing on the block above
carpet-fixes.rule.potionEffectsAffectDea: Fixes dying entities being affected by splash potion effects and area effect clouds
carpet-fixes.rule.powderSnowOnlySlowIfFe: Fixes powder snow only slowing down players when there feet are in the block
carpet-fixes.rule.powderedSnowOpacityFix: Fixes powder snow letting light pass through it
carpet-fixes.rule.projectileNotDetectedO: Fixes placing a button/pressure plate inside of a projectile not activating it
carpet-fixes.rule.railInvalidUpdateOnPus: Fixes rails updating other rails before checking if they are in a valid location
carpet-fixes.rule.railMissingUpdateAfter: Fixes rails not updating other rails after being moved
carpet-fixes.rule.railMissingUpdateOnPus: Fixes rails not updating other rails on being moved, allowing for invalid states
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceDonkeyRidin:
Reverts [MC-181241](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-181241) from 18w05a
This has not been tested in 1.18 and may not work!
Re-introduces multiplayer donkey/llama dupe bug based on disconnecting while riding donkey/llama
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceFallingBloc: Re-introduces falling blocks giving block updates during the entity phase changed in 22w03a
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceFlintAndSte: Re-introduces 1.12 flint and steel behavior. Flint and steel can be used for updating observers / buds
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceInstantBloc: Re-introduces instant block updates which changed in 22w11a
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceItemShadowi: Re-introduces item shadowing! - Requires the rule `reIntroduceInstantBlockUpdates` since 22w11a
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceLightningRo: Re-introduces lightning rods being permanently powered when moved by pistons
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceOnlyAutoSav:
Reverts 'saving chunks whenever there is time spare to reduce autosave spikes' from 20w12a
This makes your hard drive work overtime, so people with slow drives might suffer from this. This fixes that!
Re-introduces only saving during autosaves instead of any time
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroducePortalGener: Re-introduces general item dupe using dolphins, and some other dimension change dupes
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceProperGoalT: Re-introduces or better said, reverts an optimization made in 21w39a that broken many entity goal timings. The optimization made many tasks slower, and others faster. It was not done correctly!
Technically this was an optimization so enabling this rule will most likely come at a performance cost!
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceReverseRail: Re-introduces reverse rail update order which only existed in 22w11a. Requires optimizedPoweredRails
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceTargetBlock: Re-introduces target blocks being permanently powered when moved by pistons
carpet-fixes.rule.reIntroduceVeryAggress: Re-introduces very aggressive saving by removing the chunk save cooldown that was added in 22w05a
carpet-fixes.rule.recordWorldEventFix.de: Fixes record world events being sent at the wrong time, causing multiple disks to play at the same time
carpet-fixes.rule.redstoneComponentUpdat: Fixes redstone torch/repeater/comparator update order when being broken, causing incorrect update order
carpet-fixes.rule.redstoneRedirectionMis: Fixes redstone redirection missing updates on redirecting
carpet-fixes.rule.reinforcementsSpawnOff: Fixes zombie type reinforcements spawning off centered instead of centered on a block
carpet-fixes.rule.reloadUpdateOrderFix.e:
Fixes instant wires randomly breaking - Effective after chunk reload.
[MC-89146](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-89146)
carpet-fixes.rule.reloadUpdateOrderFix.d: Fixes reload update order for tile entities
carpet-fixes.rule.repairCostItemNotStack: Fixes Named Blocks not stacking due to useless RepairCost tag
carpet-fixes.rule.repeaterPriorityFix.de: Fixes Quick pulses getting lost in repeater setups
carpet-fixes.rule.respawnDragonWithoutAl: Fixes being able to respawn the ender dragon using only 2 ender crystals instead of the intended 4
carpet-fixes.rule.saferItemTransfers.des: Changes the code to use less copy calls, and instead pass references when possible
carpet-fixes.rule.selfHarmFix.desc: Fixes mobs attacking themselves. Self-Harm should not be taught to kids ;)
carpet-fixes.rule.sheepEatGrassThroughBl: Fixes sheep being able to eat grass through full blocks
carpet-fixes.rule.shipwreckChunkBorderIs: Fixes shipwrecks having different block palettes and heights between chunk borders
carpet-fixes.rule.shulkerBoxMissingUpdat: Fixes shulker box missing a block update
carpet-fixes.rule.simulatedOutOfMemoryCr: Should only be used if you know what you are doing!
carpet-fixes.rule.sitGoalAlwaysResetting: Fixes the SitGoal continuously restarting if the owner is offline, instead of doing the checks normally
Currently does not change any vanilla mechanics. Although this bug might cause issues in other mods!
carpet-fixes.rule.sleepingDelaysFallDama: Fixes fall damage being delayed by sleeping, fall damage will be removed instead
carpet-fixes.rule.sleepingResetsThunderF: Fixes the thunder timer being reset whenever players sleep
carpet-fixes.rule.slowedEntityGoalsFix.d: Fixes an optimization in 1.18 changing the behaviour of many goals even though mojang said it would change nothing
carpet-fixes.rule.slowedEntityGoalsFix.e: This bug results in many goals being slower, or happening less often. It also seems to cause other goals to be faster!
carpet-fixes.rule.snowGolemAttackCreeper: Fixes snow golem attacking creepers, resulting in there death
carpet-fixes.rule.snowmanCreateSnowWhile: Fixes snowman creating snow while not touching the ground
carpet-fixes.rule.someUpdatesDontCatchEx: Fixes crashes caused by block updates using the SixWayEntry update. Currently only useful for OOM!
When enabled, this might lower performance. Should only be used for testing!
carpet-fixes.rule.soulSpeedIncorrectDama: Fixes soul speed enchantment from damaging boots when riding a vehicle
carpet-fixes.rule.spawnChunkEntitiesUnlo: Fixes Spawn Chunks not ticking entities and block entities if no player online
carpet-fixes.rule.spawnEggMissingEventFi: Fixes Spawning entities using spawn eggs on entities not creating ENTITY_PLACE game event
carpet-fixes.rule.spawnEggMissingOcclusi: Fixes Spawning entities using spawn eggs on vibration occluding blocks not occluding
carpet-fixes.rule.spawnEggOffsetEventFix: Fixes spawn eggs having an offset game event when spawning an entity
Fixes the end gateway teleport check using blocks that should be invalid as valid for teleporting
carpet-fixes.rule.spongeUpdateFix.desc: Fixes sponges not giving block updates when absorbing water
carpet-fixes.rule.statusUpdateDelay.desc: Allows you to change how long the server player list wait before updating
carpet-fixes.rule.statusUpdateDelay.extr: delay is in nanoseconds. Default is 5 seconds (5000000000) [1m,10s,5s,1s]
carpet-fixes.rule.stepAndDestroyBlockGoa: Fixes the stepAndDestroyBlockGoal using the origin without first checking if its valid
carpet-fixes.rule.stringDupeFix.desc: Fixes a string dupe using water & tripwire hooks
carpet-fixes.rule.structureManagerCantLo:
This makes it possible for structure blocks to load snbt files also.
Should not be used in survival or for datapacks, since its slower than nbt
Fixes the structure manager not being able to load snbt versions of nbt files
carpet-fixes.rule.structuresIgnorePassen:
It will still usually fail since both entities have the same UUID, use the rule: `duplicateEntityUUIDFix` to get around this
[MC-103452](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-103452)
Fixes structure blocks not being able to save entities with passengers
carpet-fixes.rule.sweepingIgnoresFireAsp: Fixes sweeping edge not applying fire aspect
carpet-fixes.rule.tallGrassWaterWontSpre: Fixes tall grass not spreading water
carpet-fixes.rule.targetBlockUpdateFix.d: Fixes target blocks not giving shape updates when retracted and immediately repowered
carpet-fixes.rule.teleportPastWorldBorde: Fixes enderman, chorus fruit, and some other teleports from teleporting past the world border
carpet-fixes.rule.tileDropsAffectedByFlo: Fixes tile drops at the world border spawning at the wrong location
carpet-fixes.rule.tntCantUseNetherPortal: Fixes TNT Entity not being able to go through nether portals
carpet-fixes.rule.tntExtendedHitboxClipF: Fixes tnt being created in extended hitboxes causing tnt to clip through them
carpet-fixes.rule.tntMinecartExplodesTwi: Fixes Tnt Minecarts being able to explode twice, killing their own drops
carpet-fixes.rule.tntMinecartTerribleCol: Fixes tnt minecarts blowing up when basically turning any rail while next to a block
carpet-fixes.rule.toggleEnforceWhitelist: Allows you to toggle enforcing the whitelist without needing to restart the server
carpet-fixes.rule.toggleFlightEnabled.de: Allows you to toggle flightEnabled without needing to restart the server
carpet-fixes.rule.toggleOnlineMode.desc: Allows you to toggle onlineMode without needing to restart the server
carpet-fixes.rule.togglePreventProxyConn: Allows you to toggle preventing proxy connections without needing to restart the server
carpet-fixes.rule.togglePvpEnabled.desc: Allows you to toggle pvpEnabled without needing to restart the server
carpet-fixes.rule.tradeDemandDecreasesIn: Fixes villager trade demand decreases indefinitely
carpet-fixes.rule.transparentBlocksNegat: Fixes Transparent blocks placed between bookshelves and enchanting tables negating bonuses received
carpet-fixes.rule.trapdoorMissingUpdateF: Fixes some blocks not popping off when a trapdoor opens
carpet-fixes.rule.treeTrunkLogicFix.desc: Fixes trees considering the bottom block as a trunk and modifying leaves because of it
carpet-fixes.rule.tridentFallingDamageFi: Fixes tridents not dealing damage after having been in a block
carpet-fixes.rule.tripwireHookDupeFix.de: Fixes a tripwire hook dupe using doors & trapdoors
carpet-fixes.rule.tripwireNotDisarmingFi: Fixes tripwires not being disarmed correctly
carpet-fixes.rule.turtleEggWrongCollisio: Fixes being able to step on turtle eggs without colliding with the collision shape
carpet-fixes.rule.unableToModifyPlayerDa: Fixes not being able to use /data on players
carpet-fixes.rule.updateSuppressionCrash: No longer fixes an actual crash, the crash is only possible if you use: `reIntroduceInstantBlockUpdates`
carpet-fixes.rule.uselessDetectorRailUpd: Fixes the detector rail giving useless comparator updates on entity collision
carpet-fixes.rule.uselessSelfBlockUpdate: Fixes blocks using updateNeighbors() on blocks next to them, making itself get a block update even though it does not accept block updates
Some blocks do accept block updates, although we make sure to update them correctly
carpet-fixes.rule.velocitySeparateAxisCa: Fixes player velocity on X and Z axis being cancelled separately at low values
carpet-fixes.rule.viewerCountNegativesFi: Fixes the viewer count for some inventories (chest, ender chest, barrel) being able to go into the negatives
carpet-fixes.rule.villagerDiscountIgnore: Fixes villagers not giving a discount if you log out while they are being cured
carpet-fixes.rule.villagerToWitchBedOccu: Fixes villagers converting to witches while sleeping, not changing the bed occupancy
carpet-fixes.rule.villagersDontReleaseMe: Fixes villagers not releasing there tickets & positional memories when changing dimension, causing them to attempt to pathfind to them causing insane lag
carpet-fixes.rule.voidKillsLoyaltyTriden: Fixes the void killing loyalty tridents, even though they should come back to the player
carpet-fixes.rule.voidTradingFix.extra: The ability to trade with a villager in unloaded chunks allowing for infinite trading
carpet-fixes.rule.wardenEatsArmorFix.des: Fixes the warden being able to consume armor dispensed onto it
carpet-fixes.rule.witchAndCatSpawnMerged: Fixes witches & cats spawning inside of each other, by shifting the cat over by another block
carpet-fixes.rule.witchHutsSpawnIncorrec: Fixes incorrect cat types spawning inside swamp huts
carpet-fixes.rule.witherGolemSpawningFix: Fixes Withers and Golems not spawning due to replaceable blocks being in the way
carpet-fixes.rule.worldBorderCollisionRo: Fixes world border collision rounding to blocks for entity collisions
carpet-fixes.rule.xpOrbCollisionFix.desc: Fixes experience orbs treating flowing lava as a full block
carpet-fixes.rule.zeroDamageHurtsWolvesF: Fixes wolves getting hurt from damage that should not hurt, such as snowballs
